summary: This document is an email chain from March 7, 2019, discussing a Politico article about a fresh court battle that could expose more details in Alex Acosta's controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondents are coordinating a call with Judge Cassell and express interest in the unsealing component of the litigation.

persons.name: Alex Acosta
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject line and article link regarding his controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the case; the plea deal with Acosta is the subject of the litigation and article.

persons.name: Judge Cassell
persons.context: Has a call scheduled with the email correspondents regarding the litigation about the Epstein plea deal.

connections.description: Acosta, as former U.S. Attorney, was involved in negotiating a controversial plea deal for Epstein.

events.title: Email discussion about Epstein plea deal litigation
events.description: Email correspondence about a Politico article and scheduling a call with Judge Cassell regarding litigation to expose details of the Epstein-Acosta plea deal.

events.title: Politico article on Acosta-Epstein plea deal
events.description: Politico publishes article titled 'Fresh court battle could expose more details in Acosta's controversial Epstein plea deal'.

keyFacts: A fresh court battle was underway in March 2019 that could expose more details of Alex Acosta's controversial plea deal with Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondents had a call scheduled with Judge Cassell for the following day regarding this litigation.
There was specific interest in the 'unsealing component' of the litigation, relating to current applications.
The discussion was prompted by a Politico article published on March 6, 2019.
